Package arez.browser.extras

Browser utilities using the core Arez primitives and Elemental2.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrowserLocation
    This is a simple abstraction over browser location as a hash.
    IdleStatus
    An observable model that declares state that tracks when the user is "idle".
    IntervalTicker
    An Observable model that "ticks" at a specified interval.
    NetworkStatus
    An observable model that declares state that tracks when the user is "online".
    ObservablePromise<T,E>
    An observable model that wraps a Promise and exposes observable state that track the state of the promise.
    TimedDisposer
    Utility class that will dispose specified target after a delay.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ObservablePromise.State
    The state of the promise.

Package arez.browser.extras Description

Browser utilities using the core Arez primitives and Elemental2.
